titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on acetic acid, cyano-(3-[(6-methyoxy-2-benzothiazoyl)amino]-1H-isoindol-1-ylidene}-, pentyl ester.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/10/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on acetic acid, cyano-(3-[(6-methyoxy-2-benzothiazoyl)amino]-1H-isoindol-1-ylidene}-, pentyl ester.
